summary: A Chicago journalist suffering from memory loss takes leaves from his job and returns to his rural hometown, where he bonds with his Alzheimer's-impaired uncle Rollie and his old flame.
cast: Matthew Broderick|Virginia Madsen|Alan Alda|Jimmy Bennett|Louis C.K.|Jim True-Frost|Dylan Baker|Bobby Cannavale|Jeff Perry|Lois Smith|Tom Aldredge|Ray Thomas|Chris Bauer|Heidi Neurauter|Carolyn Baeumler|Doug Bost|P.J. Brown|Michael Wright|Gentry Miller|Ernie Banks|Chris Collins|David Corbett|Bhavna de Montebello|Patrick Fitzgerald|Brad Haugen|Joseph Kwasny|Mary Jo Mandula|Paul Mixon|Zsofia Otvos|Charles Parnell|Angel Perez|David Martin Rose|Jack Sabato|Danton Stone|Karla Strum|Liz Walsh|Jim Coe|Harold Daniels III|Harry L. Seddon|Evan Shafran|Justin Michael Woods
title: Memoria perdida
